ads.title: Virtual Reality Headset
ads.short_description: ETVR 3D Movies Games Glasses VR Box Google Cardboard Immersive Virtual Reality Headset with Controller
ads.long_description:
1【Ventilated Equipment】Detachable attracted-iron cover and two ventilated holes on the two sides provides excellent heat dissipation. Elastic anti-slide fixed belt ensure phone safety.         
            2【Decompression design】This adjustable T-shaped straps balance the stress on heads, and reduce 30% pressure around face . Adjustable and fit for various size of heads (both adults and children).
            3【Wide angle & HD Lens】 HD Resin Anti-blue Aspherical Lens and 120-degree wider viewing angle provides an amazing visual fidelity and engrossing 3D experience. No vertigo, more pleasure.
            4【Adjustable PD and OD】 Pupil distance and object distance can be adjusted separately to satisfy different needs. It is perfect for people with myopia under 600 degree.
            5【ENJOY APPS GAMES】 like never before: You can download over 1000 of virtual reality apps from Apple Store and Google Play - for FREE. You can also enjoy fully interactive 3D videos from YouTube or dedicated VR websites. Immersing into fascinating 360° Videos Games have never been easier.

ads.title: 3D Virtual Reality Glasses with Stereo Headphone with gamepad
ads.short_description: Large Viewing Immersive Experience 3D Virtual Reality Glasses with Stereo Headphone with gamepad
ads.long_description:
【High-Definition Individually Adjustment Lenses】 Built-in Japan Optical Grade PMMA Ergonomic Aspheric Lenses. Pupil Distance(PD) and Focal Distance(FD) can be adjusted to get the best immersive virtual reality experience, help you adjust the fuzziness and alleviate eye fatigue. Myopia 0-600° without wearing glasses. ETVR vr headset offers 100° immersive wide field of view and 360° panoramic videos and photos.

            【Hi-Fi Immersive Stereo Headphone】Using comfortable memory sponge to fill the ear pad for reducing the stress on your ears and isolating noise. Adjustable length and direction headphone suits for different people.
            
            【Detachable Front Cover】Magnetic attached front cover is removed easily. Two cracks on both sides for better heat dissipation, keep your phone cooling, let you enjoy longer virtual reality experience.
            
            【Humanized Design】ETVR vr headset designed a comfortable T-shape head straps, it can easily adjust to fit adults or children with different head styles, bring you extra comfort and secure when you fully enjoy. Removable breathable sponge area for comfortable wearing and easy clean.
            
            【Latest version of VR】Compatible for 4.7-6.4 inch display (Android/IOS, outer dimensions max 80x150mm) smartphones. Experience the real, exciting and amazing world with latest version of ETVR virtual reality headset. You can enjoy 3D movies and varieties videos, games in your private world.
